ComicInfo.Summary:
G.I. Joe takes the action underground, as a team led by Roadblock chases the mysterious monsters summoned by Crystal Ball!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Aaron Conley (a) & Jean-Francois Beaulieu (c) | 1 | Sub-A | Subscription Cover A | Giannis Milonogiannis | 2 | Sub-B | Subscription Cover B | Drew Johnson (a) & David Garcia Cruz (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Ulises Fariñas | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-10 14:09:12. [CVDB602940]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Andre Campos, David Garcia Cruz, Jean-Francois Beaulieu, Mark Roberts
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Aaron Conley, David Garcia Cruz, Drew Johnson, Giannis Milonogiannis, Jean-Francois Beaulieu, Ulises Fariñas
ComicInfo.Characters: Cover Girl, Crystal Ball, Doc, Duke, Grand Slam, Polly, Roadblock, Rock & Roll, Salvo, Scarlett, Shipwreck, Skywarp, Spirit, Tunnel Rat
